No word.\nClick to configure list(s) 你好 Hello nĭ hăo …Loading… Welcome to HSK Flashcard Widget! \n \nThis app enables you to set up as many widgets on your phone, and select which HSK words you want to see. We recommend to choose the level your at plus the one below, or above depending on your learning path. \n \nYou can come back to this screen at any time to set up a new widget, or reconfigure existing ones.
Add a new widget Your launcher does not support automatically adding widgets.\nPlease add the Flashcard widget manually:\nLong press on the home screen → Widgets → Mandarin Assistant. Dictionary Lists
